attributes.action: We have voted to leave the EU so don't allow free movement of people to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: As discussed at the EU summit the EU leaders are not allowing us to leave lightly. We are being blackmailed that we are not allowed access to the single market unless we allow free movement of people to the UK.
attributes.background: The EU are making things very awkward for the UK to leave the EU. This is a petition for the EU to allow us to leave without the UK being involved with free movement of people. Immigration was one of the main factors the UK voted to leave the EU.
